attributes.action: Call a referendum to ask the people of this country whether they wish the indigenous people to eventually be a minority race/culture in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is predicted that the native majority of this country shall eventually become a minority which may have widespread implications on our customary way of life and its governance.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
